description: Welcome Maya Matthews to her first Hogtied appearance. Maya is in a lifestyle relationship with the Sarge. So I guess if you're the Sgt's fiancée you should be pretty tough huh? Well Maya is all that, and tougher. We did some intense ties and some great orgasms, but the highlight of the shoot was the final caning. Maya LOVES the cane, and so she gets the harsh treatment she craves and more. When I say harsh I mean harsh even for Hogtied. In the end Maya loved her marks. She only spent a brief time with us, but it genuinely shows on her face.
title: Maya Matthews
